metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8936 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in squidGuard.cgi in squidGuard before 1.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a blocked site link.

criterions.comment: squidguard: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
